scripts.deploy: cross-env ENV=${ENV:-test} VERSION=`jq .version package.json` AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 npm run deploy:inner
scripts.deploy:inner: npm run deploy:tag && npm run deploy:cf
scripts.deploy:cf: node-cf-deploy update-stack --name CfBudgetMs-${ENV} -P Env=${ENV} -P EnvVars="NODE_ENV=production ENV=${ENV}" -P GitTag=v${VERSION} -P SubDomainName=budget-ms-${ENV} -P NodeModule=budget-node-ms -P BootstrapScriptName=node-bootstrap -f node_modules/\@alphaeadev/cf-infra-code/cloudformation-templates/node-cf-template.json -S && npm run deploy:terminate-instances
